definition: (of two persons) in direct encounter, being a system of play in which an individual defensive player guards an individual offensive player
details:
adverb
- (of two persons) in direct encounter
= example: (of two persons) in direct encounter
= synonyms: person-to-person
adjective
- being a system of play in which an individual defensive player guards an individual offensive player
= example: being a system of play in which an individual defensive player guards an individual offensive player
= synonyms: man-to-man
- directly between two individuals
= example: directly between two individuals
